subject: Football
lead_paragraph: On the night Brett Favre joined the Jets, Brett Ratliff, on his first N.F.L. play, threw a 71-yard and a 70-yard touchdown pass to David Clowney.
snippet: On the night Brett Favre joined the Jets, Brett Ratliff, on his first N.F.L. play, threw a 71-yard and a 70-yard touchdown pass to David Clowney.
